mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_musical (comment_content, comment_dt, comment_star_ct, user_nickname) VALUE (#{commentContent}, now(), #{commentStarCt}, #{userNickname})
mapper.select: SELECT comment_idx, comment_content, comment_dt, comment_star_ct, user_nickname) FROM t_comment WHERE deleted_yn = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE t_comment SET comment_content = #{commentContent}, comment_dt = now(), comment_star_ct = #{commentStarCT}, comment_idx = comment_idx WHERE comment_idx = #{comment_idx}
mapper.delete: UPDATE t_comment SET deleted_yn = 'Y', comment_dt = now(), comment_idx = comment_idx WHERE comment_idx = #{comment_idx}
